attributes.action: Make it legal for private citizens to carry firearms.
attributes.additional_details: It is obvious now that gun legislation has not worked, all people today that die from gun violence in the UK comes from illegal weapons, and the figures continue to rise, so reverse the laws on gun permits and make it possible that citizens can open carry, using as guidelines the laws of the USA, more relevant .. Texas.
attributes.background: It is obvious today with the influx of migrants, regular citizens cannot rely on the Police fore to be there to protect them within a reliable margin, therefore it only seems reasonable that the British public be allowed to be able to defend themselves.
